__e: I always sensed there was something... Off about him.

When I heard the full details of the affair between Mum and Harry, I was really happy because I've always felt like she spent her whole life looking for love, and I certainly felt that, in the last years of her life,
And only then did I realise... that youth is no excuse. And that it might have been possible to find out the truth.
But there... There was one thing that stuck with me. Something I felt when I bit you.
I can't tell you the last time I felt either one of those things.
And the moment she turned to walk away from me, do you know what I felt?
What if they sensed it? What if they're on their way?
The terror that she must've felt, it's just...
The reason you haven't felt it is because it doesn't exist.
And my world ends. I have never felt greater love... Than when I hold my husband in my arms.
I sensed him when he was injured.
Jesse I can't believe you didn't feel anything when you saw me tonight.
I think i felt it move.
You know, Gmür, this is the fist time I felt how dangerous I want to become.
Didn't you feel what it did for me?
He's more than that-- he-he sensed me coming, and I barely even got out of there.
You would have had a psychic flash if we were, and since you haven't, we're not.
I've never felt that right away with anyone else, and I didn't want to lose that.
